alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 11:35PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Buffalo County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gibbon, or 12 miles northeast of Kearney, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poole and Ravenna. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 288 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
